PREMIUM COVER: The high-gloss, abrasion-resistant PVC covering is soft to the touch but built to stand up to all-weather play season after season

GAME READY: This ball is designed for premium performance and is perfect for training, scrimmages and tournament play

product_description: Franklin's Mystic Soccer ball is made to official size 3 and weight and designed for training and competitive scrimmages. The high gloss PVC cover with electrifying styling is precision stitched to provide durable abrasion resistance to withstand the rigors of youthful training. The dark pentagon panels enhance the spotting that help provide kick targeting. Foam cushioned to provide responsiveness and control in play. The long lasting air retention bladder will ensure the ball remains at pressure on the pitch. Ready to roll, this ball is designed for everyday play. An inflation pump is included so that you can inflate the ball and play right away.

name: Icon Sports Officially Licensed FC Barcelona Soccer Ball
product_description: At Icon Sports, soccer is our passion. With an extensive portfolio of over 45 official licenses spanning world-renowned clubs, national teams, and premier leagues, we are committed to bringing fans closer to the teams they love through premium, officially licensed products. We specialize in soccer balls, apparel, and accessories, delivering the perfect blend of performance, style, and team pride in every item we create. From match day on the pitch to cheering in the stands, our products are designed to meet the highest standards for players, fans, and everyone who shares the love of the game. From grassroots fields to the global stage, Icon Sports is dedicated to producing authentic, high-quality soccer gear that embodies the spirit and passion of the sport, one ball, one jersey, and one club at a time.

name: adidas World Cup 2026 Competition Ball - Inspired by la Ola Wave Design, Seamless Surface for Precision and Stability, FIFA Quality Pro
short_description: [INSPIRED DESIGN] The iconic "la ola" wave design inspires the flowing four-panel design of this adidas Trionda Competition ball, making it a spectacular sight on the field.
[SEAMLESS SURFACE] Thermal bonded seamless surface for a more predictable trajectory, better touch, and lower water uptake, ensuring precision and stability during matches.
[TEXTURED SURFACE] Textured surface for improved flight stability and precision, allowing for accurate passes and shots.
[FIFA QUALITY PRO] This ball has the highest FIFA rating, passing tests on weight, water uptake, shape, and size retention, ensuring top quality performance on the field.
[VIBRANT GRAPHICS] Vibrant graphics inspired by the three host countries of FIFA World Cup 26, mimicking the look of the tournament's official match ball for a stylish and functional design.
product_description: Get ready for the ultimate soccer experience with the adidas World Cup 2026 Competition Ball. Inspired by the iconic "la ola" wave, this ball features a unique four-panel design and vibrant graphics representing the host countries of the FIFA World Cup 26. The seamless surface and textured design provide enhanced precision and stability, while the FIFA Quality Pro rating ensures top performance on the field. Whether you're playing in a match or practicing your skills, this ball is the perfect choice for any soccer enthusiast.

Kontrastreiche Grafiken helfen Ihnen, den Ball leicht zu verfolgen. כדור הכדורגל של Nike Academy כולל חריצים מעוצבים לסיבוב עקבי כאשר הכדור באוויר. גרפיקה עם ניגודיות גבוהה מסייעת לך לעקוב אחר הכדור בקלות. تتميز كرة القدم أكاديمي تيم من نايك بأخاديد مصبوبة مصممة من أجل دوران ثابت عندما تكون الكرة في الهواء. رسومات عالية التباين تساعدك على تتبع الكرة بسهولة. A bola de futebol da equipe Nike Academy apresenta sulcos moldados projetados para uma rotação consistente quando a bola está no ar. Gráficos de alto contraste ajudam você a rastrear facilmente a bola. 这款 Nike Academy Team 足球采用模压槽设计,在空中时能持续旋转。 高对比度图形帮助您轻松追踪球。 Nike Academy Team 足球採用模製凹槽,專為在球進入空氣時穩定旋轉而設計。 高對比度圖形幫助您輕鬆追蹤球道。 나이키 아카데미 팀 축구공은 공이 공중에 있을 때 일관된 회전을 위해 설계된 몰드 그루브가 특징입니다. 고대비 그래픽으로 공을 쉽게 추적할 수 있습니다.
